title: Pacific Bahari Water Sports Adventure (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy a thrilling half-day of jet skiing, banana boat rides, and snorkeling at Pacific Bahari Water Sports in Tanjung Benoa.

stops.description: Depart for Pacific Bahari Water Sports, Tanjung Benoa.
Arrive and get ready for water activities.
Experience jet skiing and banana boat rides.
Snorkel in the clear waters of Tanjung Benoa.

title: Pacific Bahari Water Sports Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of water sports fun at Pacific Bahari, including parasailing, snorkeling, and jet skiing.

stops.description: Depart for Pacific Bahari Water Sports, Tanjung Benoa.
Arrive and prepare for a day of activities.
Enjoy breathtaking views during a parasailing session.
Ride jet skis and banana boats.
Snorkel and try other available water sports.
